entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tasiujaq Airport 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -39.5°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -43.5°C
Wind: SW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 34.
